channel.title: Azure Cloud Deployment How-Tos on Iguazio MLOps Platform Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Azure Cloud Deployment How-Tos on Iguazio MLOps Platform Documentation

item.title: Installing the Platform on a Microsoft Azure Cloud
item.description: Overview This guide outlines the required steps for installing (deploying) an instance of the MLOps Platform ("the platform") to a Microsoft Azure cloud. When you complete the procedure, you'll have a platform instance running under your Azure account. TroubleshootingIf you run into issues during the installation, check out the platform's Azure-installation troubleshooting guide. For further assistance, contact Iguazio's support team. Warning Provisioning of the servers is handled automatically by the platform installer (Provazio).
